await ApiService.updateDriver(currentDriver.id,formData);}else{// Create new driver
await ApiService.createDriver(formData);}// Reset form and reload drivers

localStorage.setItem('lastDriverSync',new Date().toISOString());localStorage.setItem('lastDriverSyncCount',data.imported+data.updated);// Update the stats in state
